Apply hemisphere based localization (season labels, moon phase icons).
Ajoute les secondes dans l\'affichage des heures.
Ajoute l\'heure dans l\'affichage des dates.
Show abbreviated month names when displaying dates.
Divise les durées supérieures à 7 jours en semaines (ex : 15j devient 2s 1j).
Ajoute les heures et les minutes dans les durées supérieures à un jour.
Afficher l\'ombre d\'un objet d\'une hauteur de%1$s.
Scan for and load third party plugins.
[w] Location permissions are required to update the current location.
Compare the amount of daylight today against yesterday or tomorrow.
L\'ID ne doit être ni vide ni contenir d\'espace.
La chaîne d\'affichage ne doit pas être vide.
L\'ID est déjà pris. Cette action sera écrasée.
Les actions par défaut ne peuvent pas être supprimées.\n\nRevenir aux valeurs par défaut ?
Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir revenir aux valeurs par défaut ?\n\nToutes les actions personnalisées seront supprimées.
Actions réinitialisées aux valeurs par défaut.
L\'ID doit être unique (ne doit pas déjà être utilisé).
Le nom du thème ne doit pas être vide.
La taille doit être un entier >= %1$s.
La taille doit être un entier <= %1$s.
Ajouter ou supprimer des événements personnalisés.
Cet événement ne sera plus affiché.
Are you sure you want to delete %1$s (%2$s)?\n\nAlarms, notifications, or widgets using this event may no longer work and should be reassigned.
Are you sure you want to clear custom events?\n\nAlarms, notifications, or widgets using these events may no longer work and should be reassigned.
Etes-vous certain de vouloir supprimer%1$s at %2$s (%3$s)?
Are you sure you want to delete all alarms?
Imported alarms might revert some settings to defaults.\n\nYou may need to (re)select sounds and actions.
Override the alarm time?\n\nThis alarm will no longer be scheduled by event.
Optimizing battery use.\nAlarms may be delayed up to 15 minutes.
[w] Sony STAMINA mode is enabled.\nAlarms may fail to work reliably.
Optimizing battery use.\nAlarms may fail to work reliably.
Off.\nAlarms may fail to work after reboot.

string.name: alarms_warning_autostart
string.xliff:g: [w] Autostart is disabled!\nAlarms may fail to work after reboot.

resources.string: [w] Application is restricted!\nAlarms may fail to work reliably.
Inactives.\nAlarms may fail to display correctly.
[w] Notifications are off. Alarms may fail to display correctly.
Off.\nAlarms may fail to display over the lock screen.
[w] Full-screen notifications are off. Alarms may fail to display over the lock screen.
Alarms are automatically rescheduled a few minutes after reboot.\n\n%1$s
%s is performing work in the background.
Fullscreen alarms are initially dark, then slowly change color and increase in brightness.
Show all system sounds during selection (ignore ringtone type).
Show alarm clock icon in the app tray.
Wake the device from the power off state.\npackage: %s
Wake up time is not set.
Control \'Do Not Disturb\' settings with an automatic rule.
Set the bedtime to %s before wake up time?
Set the wake up alarm to %s after bedtime?
Settings found,\nbut they are for other widgets…
Restore Backup. Imported settings will be cached for now and restored later when requested by the launcher.
Best Guess. Imported settings will be applied to existing widgets by type.
Direct Import. Imported settings will be applied directly. This only works correctly if the widget ids are unchanged.
Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir revenir aux valeurs par défaut ?
Clear. Alarms will be cleared before importing from backup.
Keep Existing. Existing alarms will be preserved (may result in duplicates).
Clear. Places will be cleared before importing from backup.
Keep Existing. Existing places will be preserved (may result in duplicates).
Ignore Existing. Places will be added if they do not already exist (ignore existing).
Overwrite Existing. Places will be updated if they already exist.

Affiche le midi lunaire et minuit lunaire dans le cadre du dialogue de la lune.
Include midpoints between solstices and equinoxes.
Affiche la durée restante avant le prochain solstice ou équinoxe.
Affiche une étiquette contenant le nom de la source de données actuelle.
Affiche un bouton de la barre d\'action qui ouvre l\'application de carte par défaut.

Afficher le prochain coucher de soleil

Démarrer l\'assistant de configuration au premier lancement.

Privacy:
Suntimes does not collect, store, or transmit personal user data. It contains no advertising, no analytics, no trackers, and no unnecessary permissions.

Privacy:
Suntimes does not collect, store, or transmit personal user data. It contains no advertising, no analytics, no trackers, and no unnecessary permissions.

The app is configured from location data. This information (and other configuration data used by the app) is stored locally and does not leave the device.

%1$s

Suntimes uses the location permission to determine your current longitude and latitude.

This permission is optional; the location is manually configured by default.
Suntimes uses external storage permissions to backup/export data to file (e.g. places, themes).

Suntimes Alarms uses the external storage permission to play sounds located on the SD card.

This permission is optional; the default sound will be played if access is denied. This permission is not needed for system sounds (Media Storage).
Suntimes needs Do Not Disturb access to change these settings at bedtime.

A permission that belongs to Suntimes:

%1$s

is also defined by: %2$s
Cette fonctionnalité n\'est pas prise en charge par l\'API %1$s.
Cette fonctionnalité n\'est pas prise en charge par la source de données utilisée.
Vous devez re-démarrer l\'application pour que ces modifciations soient appliquées.
A restart may be needed for changes to take full effect.
Do not show this message again
Un algorithme simple, relativement rapide mais imprécis.
Implémente les algorithmes publiés par la National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration.
Implémente les algorithmes publiés par Dershowitz/Reingold dans leur livre "Calendrical Calculations" (troisième édition).
Basé sur les calculs astronomiques publiés par Jean Meeus dans son livre "Astronomical Algorithms" (seconde édition).
